# Summary

This page descrives the Japanese job-search market based on the Referentials and Placements by Prefecture, Employment Referral Statistics which reports monthly numbers of vacancy, job seekers, and new employment.
We report not only simple time series of vacancy, job seeker, and new employment but also the labor market mismatch [@csahin2014mismatch] and the welfare impact [@kawata2021welfare].
Important note that @ippei2020labor estiamtes the mismatch index in Japanese labor market (from 2000 - 2019).
